short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track time spent on different websites with alerts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Born from my own struggle to maintain a healthy digital balance, Screen Time Tracker is a simple yet powerful tool that helps you understand and manage your online time.

Features:
Silently tracks time spent on every website
Shows beautiful, easy-to-read statistics
Sets personalized daily time limits
Sends gentle reminders when you exceed your goals
Keeps your data private and local to your device
